text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>5. Bey Herrn Daniel Eckenstein dem Buchdrucker in der Eschemer-Vorstatt sind folgende Bücher zu haben: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Dr. Johann Rambach</AUTHOR> <TITLE>erbauliches Hand-Büchlein für Kinder</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR> <TITLE>sechs Geistreiche Bücher vom wahren Christenthum</TITLE></BIBL>; Item <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Geistreiches Paradys-Gärtlein</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann-Hübner</AUTHOR> <TITLE>zweymahl zwey und fünffzig auserlesene Biblische Historien aus dem alten und neuen Testament</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Der Gnaden-Schlüssel aller Kinderen GOttes</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>die Weege und Wercke GOttes in der Seele</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. Item: <BIBL><TITLE>Übungen sich stets in der Gegenwart GOttes zu halten</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":12,"explanation":"The primary structural issue was an improperly nested <BIBL> tag for Johann Arndt's second book. This was corrected by closing the first <BIBL> and creating a new, distinct <BIBL> entry for the second book, explicitly stating 'Johann Arndt' as the author instead of 'desselben'. Additionally, several character encoding errors (e.g., '\\u221a\\u00b' for 'ü', '\\u221a\\u2264' for 'o', '\\u221a\\u00a7' for 'ä') and a specific word corruption ('de\\u221a\\u00fcselben' to 'desselben') were corrected to ensure readability and accuracy of the German text. In total, 2 structural/semantic XML corrections and 10 character encoding corrections were made."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>5. Bey Herrn Daniel Eckenstein dem Buchdrucker in der Eschemer-Vorstatt sind folgende Bücher zu haben: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Dr. Johann Rambach</AUTHOR> <TITLE>erbauliches Hand-Büchlein für Kinder</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR> <TITLE>sechs Geistreiche Bücher vom wahren Christenthum</TITLE></BIBL>; Item <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Geistreiches Paradys-Gärtlein</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann-Hübner</AUTHOR> <TITLE>zweymahl zwey und fünffzig auserlesene Biblische Historien aus dem alten und neuen Testament</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Der Gnaden-Schlüssel aller Kinderen GOttes</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>die Weege und Wercke GOttes in der Seele</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. Item: <BIBL><TITLE>Übungen sich stets in der Gegenwart GOttes zu halten</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>
parsed.explanation: The primary structural issue was an improperly nested <BIBL> tag for Johann Arndt's second book. This was corrected by closing the first <BIBL> and creating a new, distinct <BIBL> entry for the second book, explicitly stating 'Johann Arndt' as the author instead of 'desselben'. Additionally, several character encoding errors (e.g., '\u221a\u00b' for 'ü', '\u221a\u2264' for 'o', '\u221a\u00a7' for 'ä') and a specific word corruption ('de\u221a\u00fcselben' to 'desselben') were corrected to ensure readability and accuracy of the German text. In total, 2 structural/semantic XML corrections and 10 character encoding corrections were made.
